entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:56 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
